RESUME 
Full name 
: 
NGUYEN PHUONG HANH 
Date of Birth

07 Dec. 1981

 HANOI 
Gender  :  Female

Marital Status 
:

Permanent Address 
  : 
C14.2 Phu Hoang Anh Apartment, Nguyen Huu Tho  
Str., Phuoc Kien, Nha be District, HCMC 
Email 
: 
phuonghanh71281@gmail.com 
Highlights: 
Foreign Trade University HCMC – Graduated in 2004 
15 years in Export Fields including Logistic and Customer Service 
Good Problem Solving Skill 
Good Team Leader 
Outbound Execution Supervisor 
Louis Dreyfus Company 
Dec 2012 – Present (6 years 6 months) 
Traffic execution Officer  
Sucafina S.A. 
May 2007 – July 2012 (5 years 2 months) 
Sea Export Dept. – Customer Service 
SDV VIETNAM 
July 2005 – Apr 2007 (1 year 10 months) 
Sea Export Dept. – Customer Service 
TRIMAX LOGISTICS JOINT VENTURE COMPANY 
Sep 2003 – Jun 2005 (1 year 9 months) 
Sep 2015 – Present 
LOUIS DREYFUS COMPANY VIETNAM TRADING AND PROCESSING CO., LTD 
** Outbound Execution Supervisor 
Besides tasks as an Outbound Execution Officer mentioned below, I take more responsibilities 
as followed: 
General Responsibility: Be in charge of outbound logistics team 
Page 1 of 3 
RESUME – NGUYEN PHUONG HANH 
 
Daily download list of new contracts from system and assign to each member.  
 
Supervise team to avoid any delay or problem. 
 
Send weekly report to manager by recapping all the status of contracts, keep her updated about all 
arising problem. 
 
Solve all matter relating to pre-shipment sample, booking space with shipping line, claim from 
client for damaged goods. 
 
Be the team leader, I manage, build and retain the best team by establishing the team goals, 
assigning tasks to members, coaching new member, making year-end performance review. 
Through that I can understand the competencies of people and know what can motivate them. 
Achievements: 
 
Take the key role in the logistics process for assigned customers. 
 
Gained much knowledge of logistics planning and execution. 
 
Managerial role was improved when managing a team of 3 peoples. 
Dec 2012 – Aug 2015 
LOUIS DREYFUS COMPANY VIETNAM TRADING AND PROCESSING CO., LTD 
** Outbound Execution Officer 
General Responsibility: Handle all Sales & Purchases contracts – make sure they are executed 
comply with all contract term & conditions. 
 
Work as Representative office for parent company when the goods are allocated from Bonded 
warehouse, work with local manufacturers for shipping schedule, shipping details and send 
them shipping instructions and receive full sets of shipping documents to send to consignees. 
 
Work as Local company when allocate good from Non-bonded warehouse, follow production 
plan from warehouse to arrange shipment schedule, send them stuffing instruction. 
 
Follow up export shipments from getting contract from system until the goods arrives at 
destination on time in full (OTIF).  
 
Make sure the export shipping documents including custom declaration, Bill of lading, Certificate 
of origin from Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry & other documents such as 
Phytosanitary certificate, Fumigation Certificate, Weight, Quality, Health certificate is always 
issued correctly and in a timely manner. 
 
Solve logistics issue (if any).  
 
Issue commercial invoice, send payment request and follow up with customers for payment 
according to signed contract. 
 
Send shipment advice, full set of docs to clients by email/ courier. 
 
Generate monthly report of claim for weight loss, damaged goods 
May 2007 – Jul 2012 
SUCAFINA S.A. REP. OFFICE VIETNAM (Trading Coffee Company) 
** Traffic execution Officer        
General Responsibility:  
 
Coordinate with Geneva main office to follow up shipments from South America to Europe & 
deliveries from Europe warehouse to client. 
 
Closely communicate with relevant parties such as clients in Europe, shipper in origins, broker, 
banks, shipping line and warehouses … 
Daily works: 
 
Daily checking new contracts from system online.  
 
Follow up pre-shipment sample, sample for approval 
 
Send shipping instructions to shippers and follow up when the goods are shipped. 
 
Receive and check original documents, approve and make payment. 
 
Send landing instruction to warehouse to store the goods. 
 
Coordinate with Europe warehouses to follow up shipments, deliveries, coffee in/ out warehouses 
 
Prepare all documents for delivery/ release of goods, customs clearance and arrangement of 
moving goods between warehouses  
 
Check stock reports from all warehouses in Vietnam and Europe every month 
 
Solve problems relating to claims (such as short landed, stained bag, slack bags …) 
 
Issue commercial invoice and follow up payment. 
 
Check position of all goods every week; report to manager the status of all purchases/sales. 
Page 2 of 3 
RESUME – NGUYEN PHUONG HANH 
July 2005 – Apr 2007 
SDV VIETNAM (Freight Forwarding Company) 
** Sea Export Customer Service 
General Responsibility: Handle all Sea Export shipments. 
Daily works: 
 
Work with local customer every day, keep the informed about the status of shipments. 
 
Work with shipping line to getting the best rate, best booking and OBL. 
 
Make customer satisfy by giving them all information about the transit time, the status of container. 
 
Issue the House Bill of lading, invoice to client. 
July 2005 – Apr 2007 
TRIMAX LOGISTICS JOINT VENTURE COMPANY (Freight Forwarding Company) 
** Sea Export Customer Service 
General Responsibility: Responsible for handling Sea Export shipments 
Daily works: 
 
Contact shipping lines for freight quotation, booking, submit OBL, tracking containers. 
 
Follow up the shipment; keep client updated about information of the shipment’s status. 
 
Deal with all complains from customer relating to late delivery, rollover at transit port, damaged 
goods…and other potential problems. 
 
Issue red invoices to clients and follow up the payment process. 
 Leadership skill 
 Communication skill 
 People management skill 
 Interpersonal and organizing skill 
 Coaching skill. 
 Quick learning and logical thinking. 
 Commitment 
 Business mind-set 
 Good at English. 
 Teamwork  
 Derivative course for commodities – 2013 by Banking University HCMC 
 Fundamentals of people management – 2017 by Louis Dreyfus Company 
 Influencing Others and High Collaboration – 2018 by Professional Trainer Nguyen Ha Dong from Seed Company 
 Advanced Excel Course – 2018 by The University of Science HCM 
 Problem Solving Skill Course – 2019 by Professional Trainer Nguyen Ha Dong from Seed Company 
 Louis Dreyfus Company – Ms Thảo Nguyễn – Trading Assistant – 0961816809 
 Sucafina S.A – Ms Nguyệt Hồ - Former Logistics Manager – 0918044462 
 Trimax – Ms Huyền Nguyễn – Former Customer Service staff - 0903880489 
Page 3 of 3 
RESUME – NGUYEN PHUONG HANH

educations.major: Tiếng Việt và văn hóa Việt Nam
educations.major_categories_detail: Ngôn ngữ, văn học và văn hóa Việt Nam

experiences.detail:
Besides tasks as an Outbound Execution Officer mentioned below, I take more responsibilities as followed:
General Responsibility: Be in charge of outbound logistics team
Daily download list of new contracts from system and assign to each member.
Supervise team to avoid any delay or problem.
Send weekly report to manager by recapping all the status of contracts, keep her updated about all arising problem.
Solve all matter relating to pre-shipment sample, booking space with shipping line, claim from client for damaged goods.
Be the team leader, I manage, build and retain the best team by establishing the team goals, assigning tasks to members, coaching new member, making year-end performance review.
Through that I can understand the competencies of people and know what can motivate them.
Achievements: Take the key role in the logistics process for assigned customers.
Gained much knowledge of logistics planning and execution.
Managerial role was improved when managing a team of 3 peoples.
